title: Securing Your .NET Core Web API – Best Practices for Ultimate Protection
excerpt: In the ever-evolving world of web development, introducing your .NET Core Web API Security is not just an option—it’s a necessity. Effective API security goes beyond preventing unauthorized access; it involves protecting sensitive data, ensuring application reliability, and maintaining user trust.
